xMatixPlatform.title: xMatix Platform
xMatixPlatform.description1: Design, automate, and govern business workflows without heavy code.
xMatixPlatform.description2: xMatix Platform provides the core execution layer that powers all xMatix modules, enabling organizations to model, adapt, & run operational processes across domains with speed & control.

whatIsIt.title: What it is
whatIsIt.description2:
xMatix Platform is a no-code / low-code execution foundation for building and running operational applications.
It allows teams to model workflows, rules, and user experiences that directly drive how work gets done.
Unlike traditional systems of record, the Platform is designed for continuous execution and change.

data.coreCapabilitiesDescription: These shared capabilities enable xMatix to orchestrate workflows, enforce policies, and automate execution consistently across all operational domains.
data.executionModelDescription: xMatix supports teams modernizing operations with faster execution, governed adaptability, and incremental replacement of rigid CRM and ERP execution layers.
data.worksWithDescription: All xMatix modules run on the same execution platform. Sales, Service, Warehouse, Inventory, Procurement, Finance, Payroll, People, and Partners share a common foundation for workflows, data context, & governance.

sections.title: Business Systems Teams
sections.description: Modernize operational execution without long development cycles. Build, adapt, and govern workflows quickly using no-code tools, without creating technical debt.

sections.title: Operations & IT Leaders
sections.description: Gain visibility and control over mission-critical operations with real-time orchestration and monitoring.

sections.title: Digital Transformation Programs
sections.description: Accelerate transformation initiatives with scalable, governed automation across teams.

faqs.question: How is pricing calculated?
faqs.answer: Pricing is calculated based on the plan you choose and the number of users in your organization. Each plan has different features and scale limits to match your execution maturity level.

faqs.question: Can we start small and scale later?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can start with our Starter plan and upgrade to Growth or Enterprise as your needs grow. All your data and configurations will be preserved when you upgrade.

faqs.question: Do modules require separate platform fees?
faqs.answer: No, modules can be added to any plan without additional platform fees. You only pay for the modules you need on top of your base plan subscription.

faqs.question: Is Sense required?
faqs.answer: Sense is not required but highly recommended for enhanced workflow automation and intelligence. It can be added as a module to any plan based on your needs.

faqs.question: Do you offer enterprise pricing and SLAs?
faqs.answer: Yes, our Enterprise plan includes custom pricing, dedicated support, enterprise-grade SLAs, and advanced security features. Contact our sales team for a customized quote.

ecosystemSection.title: The Problem
ecosystemSection.description: Lead-to-cash execution is fragmented across systems. Each tool manages a step, but no system owns the full process.

ecosystem.title: CRM
ecosystem.description: Manages leads and opportunities, but does not execute downstream actions.

ecosystem.title: ERP
ecosystem.description: Handles orders and billing without real-time sales or fulfillment context.

ecosystem.title: Operations
ecosystem.description: Executes fulfillment in isolation, creating delays and manual handoffs.

ecosystem.title: AI Tools
ecosystem.description: Provide insights without the ability to act within workflows.
